Name: RotateHammerPressure
Notes: A large rotating hammer that can crush the player. Due to the way its shadows are set up, it usually has a rotation angle of 90 degrees. It comes with a huge set of parameters, configurations and optional sound effects. The sound names are self-explanatory: RotateMoveObjStart, RotateMoveObjMove, RotateMoveObjStop, Appear, RotatorRotateStart, RotatorRotateLoop, RotatorStopAtEnd, RotatorStopAtEndLoop, RotatorRotateSignStart, and RotatorRotateSignLoop. Also supports color change (ColorChange.brk) as well as texture change (TexChange.btk/.btp) animations. Lastly, it can also use the stage effects Start, Moving, and Stop.

Obj_arg0.Name: Color Frame
Obj_arg0.Description: If ColorChange.brk exists, this will define the color frame to be used.

Obj_arg1.Name: Texture Frame
Obj_arg1.Description: If TexChange.btp/.btk exists, this will define the texture frame to be used.

Obj_arg2.Name: Disable Up & Side Shadows?
Obj_arg2.Description: If set, the UpShadow and SideShadow shadows will be invalidated.

Obj_arg3.Name: Invert Push Collision Up Vector?
Obj_arg3.Description: If set, the push collision's up vector will be inverted.

RotateSpeed.Name: Rotation Speed
RotateSpeed.Description: How fast the object rotates. If RotateAccelType is set to 2, this specifies the time in frames it takes to rotate to the specified angle.

RotateAngle.Name: Rotation Angle
RotateAngle.Description: How many degrees it rotates. If RotateAccelType is not 2, 0 equals 360 which means it will rotate indefinitely.

RotateAxis.Name: Rotation Axis
RotateAxis.Description: The object's axis to rotate around.

RotateAccelType.Name: Rotation Speed Type
RotateAccelType.Description: Decides whether RotateSpeed specifies the rotation speed, acceleration, or the time it takes to rotate to the specifed angle.

Values.Notes: RotateSpeed specifies time until desired angle

RotateStopTime.Name: Restart Delay
RotateStopTime.Description: The time in frames it takes to restart rotation after stopping.

RotateType.Name: Rotation Type
RotateType.Description: Specifies how the object should continue rotating after reaching the targeted angle.

SignMotionType.Name: Shake Start Type
SignMotionType.Description: Specifies whether the object will shake before it starts moving or not.

SW_APPEAR.Description: Appears when this switch is activated.

SW_DEAD.Description: Can be activated when the object is killed through a cutscene action.

SW_B.Description: If used, the object will rotate only while this switch is activated.

SW_PARAM.Description: The rotation speed is adjusted with ParamScale while this switch is activated.

SW_AWAKE.Description: Enables rendering and resumes updates when this switch is active.

DemoCast.Description: Can take part in a cutscene. If used, the object will start to rotate once its special cutscene functor action gets triggered.

BaseMtxFollowTarget.Description: Can be followed by another BaseMtxFollower object.
